meta.fee_euro_approx: 490 GBP (Visa) + 776 GBP/year (IHS Surcharge). Total ~1.3 Lakh INR upfront for 1 year.
meta.min_funds_requirement: 1,334 GBP/month (London) or 1,023 GBP/month (Outside London) for 9 months

documents.title: CAS Number
documents.description: Confirmation of Acceptance for Studies (CAS) reference number from your university.

documents.title: Financial Evidence
documents.description: Bank statements (28 days old) OR Education Loan Sanction Letter from a nationalized Indian bank.

documents.title: TB Test Certificate
documents.description: Tuberculosis test result from an approved clinic (mandatory for India).

documents.title: Academic Transcripts
documents.description: Documents listed on your CAS (e.g., degree certificates, English test results).

documents.title: ATAS Certificate
documents.description: Academic Technology Approval Scheme certificate (if required for your course).

documents.title: Dependent Restriction
documents.description: Note: Master's students (taught courses) cannot bring dependents. Only PhD/Research students are eligible.

steps_flow.title: Receive CAS
steps_flow.description: Get the CAS number from your university after meeting all conditions.

steps_flow.title: Prepare Finances
steps_flow.description: Ensure funds have been in your account for 28 days.

steps_flow.title: Apply Online
steps_flow.description: Fill the Student Visa application on GOV.UK.

steps_flow.title: Pay Fees
steps_flow.description: Pay the Visa fee and the Immigration Health Surcharge (IHS).

application_platforms.name: University Portals
application_platforms.description: Applications are submitted directly to each university's online portal.

pre_visa_steps.title: Meet Conditions
pre_visa_steps.description: Submit final results, pay deposit, and pass TB test.
